div.p: Whenever possible, we ask that you upload three types of files for each study: data file(s), a data dictionary and the associated study protocol(s).

If you don’t have these files available at this time, you can complete the study registration by moving on to Step 5. You or an administrator can add files at a later date by logging into the WWARN website, navigating to this study in the Data home and clicking the Files tab.
